physDesc.p: Fragments 1-23 (in mm), (1) 14 x 19, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (2) 28 x 27, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (3) 37 x 31, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (4) 35 x 11, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (5) 37 x 20, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (6) 39 x 25, (A) 3 lines, right margin, (B) blank, (7) 33 x 21, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (8) 27 x 17, (A) 3 lines, left margin, (B) traces, (9) 39 x 29, (A) 8 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (10) 29 x 29, (A) 2 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (11) 28 x 35, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (12) 17 x 14, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (13) 23 x 10, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (14) 24 x 55, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (15) 20 x 72, (A) 1 line, right margin, (B) blank, (16) 20 x 35, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) 2 lines, top margin, (17) 16 x 76, (A) 2 lines, left right margins, (B) blank, (18) 60 x 30, (A) 3 lines, left top margins, (B) blank, (19) 53 x 21, (A) 3 lines, bottom margin, (B) 6 lines, no margins, (20) 52 x 46, (A) 3 lines, left (?) bottom (?) margins, (21) 71 x 36, (A) 5 lines, top right margins, (B) traces, (22) 55 x 25, (A) 3 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (23) 62 x 19, (A) 6 lines, top margin, (B) 4 lines, bottom (?) margin
